posts.post_title: WANT TO BUY - N172 Old Judge Beaters...
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric
I'm looking for beat up N172 Old Judges.

I'm open to all trimmed/skinned/badly creased - or SGC/PSA Authentics... as long as the price is right... i mean cheap!

Please email me at eric.kramer@247hq.com with what you have and the price.

Thanks!
Eric
